div.paragraph: The Style Guide will demonstrate the UX (user experience) elements that you can use to contstruct pages. It is particularly useful in determining if the website materials are correctly setup.
This element is the Jumbotron. The Jumbotron is a UX element that is intented to draw the attention. Its contents should be loud and large. It is useful on welcoming pages and on confirmation pages.
This paragraph is in Default colour.
This paragraph is in Primary colour.
This paragraph is in Info colour.
This paragraph is in Warning colour.
This paragraph is in Danger colour.
This paragraph is in Success colour.
This paragraph is in Muted colour.
This is the Text Primary font.
This is the Text Secondary font.
This is the Title Primary font.
This is the Title Secondary font.
